annotations.description: Get Lucky was created by Scott Teague of Death and Co. in New York City around 2013 and was published in Death & Co.'s first cocktail book which you guys sho...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Get Lucky

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Flor de Ca√±a 4yr Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.25oz (7.5ml) Orgeat
.25oz (7.5ml) Ginger Syrup
.25oz (7.5ml) Acacia Honey
3 Blackberries
Float Peychauds Bitters
Blackberry Garnish

Muddle  blackberries in glass. 
Shake ingredients and pour over crushed ice in glass. 
Add float of peychauds bitters. 
Top with crushed ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iGYhl35q6jM&t=0s
title: Get Lucky
